Apologies if this has already been raised.
My two local M&S Foodhalls have had new self checkouts installed. I really don't like them. Problems are:
Initially unclear which side the basket goes.
The scanner is awkward to use. The old ones scanned at waist height but the new ones are higher. I'm short and it's not easy to hold items up to the scanner and it doesn't scan immediately. I don't know how a wheelchair user or a small person would manage.
I didn't notice an 'own bag' button on the screen.
I'll be using a serviced till from now on.

Automatic Tills.
Please dont forget the large contingent of Partly Sighted or Blind shoppers. We CANT use automated tills. It’s not that we are afraid of new technology - it is shoving us aside.
my Guide fog is clever but not that clever. PLEASE ALWAYS KEEP AT LEAST ONE STAFFED TIL AT ALL TIMES,

Can I just say, all ive seen on this group so far are negative comments about M&S. We as staff work SO hard this time of year to get all of your food on the shelves, to serve you the best we can with a smile etc. Can we at least get some respect when working? Good luck to all M&S staff today on your busiest day of the year.As an ex M&S employee I know just how exhausted you already feel & today when that one customer tells you you’ve ‘ruined Christmas’ because you had the audacity to sell out of bread sauce-even tho you had thousands 🙄just keep on smiling & doing what you do-giving the best of yourself.Customers-please cut them some slack,they are doing their absolute best to give you everything you need to have an amazing time over the holiday period.MERRY CHRISTMAS

I went shopping in a large M&S food hall hoping to get some easy quick dinners. Everything ( well almost) has yeast as an ingredient which my husband is allergic to! Years ago M&S pies did not need this added, as they were tasty… now they must be tasteless and you need to add yeast extract for flavour..
yeast is becoming more of common food intolerance and many people who think they are allergic to bread may not be… just the yeast in bread.
Please m&s use natural additives not yeast in everything.

Just a little note - every Tuesday my husband and I go to our local Tesco then to a nearby M & S. Over the last few weeks we've noticed that Tesco shoppers are very reluctant to do without their masks and the vast majority still wear their masks. However, M & S today was full of people without masks. I wonder why? Also - last week I had a beautiful bunch of flowers for free and this week we had two bunches!! We do get on very well with almost all the checkout staff and we always have a laugh with them so I suppose it pays off?

I bought the Meal Deal for dinner tonight, so I wouldn't have to 'cook'. (4 meals + 4 sides). I've just gone to check the cooking instructions, and of 6 different items, there are 4 different cooking temperatures.
Now I'm going to have to average it all out to 180 degrees and work out the timings from there, and spend half an hour running back to the kitchen to add more items to the oven.
So much for an easy dinner! Surely it would be easier for everyone if everything had the same temperature?

I was so lucky to start working for M&S in 1966,they had just added the first floor extension .
The Seiffs were running it then as it was a limited company and it felt like being part of a very big family.
We were a very close loyal work force and I soon made lots of lovely friends and really enjoyed working there.The perks were great as the meals were all cheap,we could have our hair done in the lunch hour for next to nothing and had access to a Doctor and chiropodist too .We also got a great...

Just returned from a visit to M&S Widnes queued up about 20 mins to get into the food hall . It was an absolute shambles it was rammed with customers no one was social distancing not a very pleasant experience at all. I would have happily waited longer in the queue .

Went to Hedge End store yesterday evening in the hope that it would be a little quieter than during peak times. Before going in the M&S we went to Sainsbury's next door and it was a really good - plenty of space etc. However when we then went in to M&S, it was packed. It was impossible to social distance and we felt very vulnerable. I spoke to one of the supervisors who said they monitor and control shopper levels, but that clearly was not the case. We have been lucky here so far, but with what...

M&S Silverburn, Glasgow

Absolute pandemonium at Huddersfield M and S yesterday.The shop is 2 miles outside the centre in a tiny retail park.The whole area was in lockdown because the road infrastructure can’t cope.The store should never have been taken out of the town centre,one of the largest in the country.

I have to say a big thank you to M&S Inverness. Brilliant organisation.. until the old biker stepped in front of me when I was about to enter food hall .. excuse me there is a queue I said .. I know he said .. I've just joined it! No .. you join it outside like everyone else I said. He then said .. I am not talking to you any more and turned his back on me. Over comes one of the girls supervising .. spun her the same story. Bless her .. she got a manager. He arrived and told him to go back...

I shop at M & S for food every week and have done this for many years and all through the lock down managed to get to the store as pensioner I received a voucher to buy in the clothes department but could not use for food.At the checkout I sometimes receive a voucher for £10 if I spend £ 100 I never quite make this,why have the smaller vouchers stopped.I was all so offered a croissant but at that time they didn’t have any.
Am I complaining no, not about your food which is good but perhaps...

header: Jane Pritchard is at Marks and Spencer.
content: I would like to say a massive well done to Marks & Spencer at The Willows in Torquay they have worked very hard. There COVID system is really well organised and they have kept the shelves well stocked up. All the staff are working extremely hard and deserve a big pat on the back. Well done to you...

Big shop at Burnley today, found it well stocked and not too packed, although no Gin or Christmas crumpets I’ve wanted to try since seeing them on here 😍) Staff fantastic, friendly and helpful! Very patient with me, my vouchers and gift cards at the checkout and even let me loan the trolley to get my bags to the car 👍. Merry Xmas and a Happy New year and a big thank you to all the Marks and Spencer amazing staff 🌟

Once again I would like to personally thank every member of the Mark's and Spencer family for there contunied hard work,this year has been like no other there has been tears and sweat from everyone at some point .We have the most important couple of weeks coming up this year for the business and I am sure we will all put in a tremendous effort as we always do . At ten PM on Christmas eve I will get home and I am going to toast my team for all there hard work and I will also toast everyone in...

Just a quickie, lots of you clearly love marks and spencer. When you get your receipt on the back there is info on how to fill out a customer survey. We really find these useful and if you get great service please name the employee whom served you. Each store gets to see what is working and what is not.
It takes ten mins max to fill out. As employees we really appreciate any feedback.

Safe shopping tip #2 Shop alone, not in groups 💁‍♀️
• There will be exceptions such as single parents with small children who can’t be left at home, but where possible try to shop alone.
• This will reduce the number of people inside stores, making physical distancing easier to achieve.
It also reduces the number of people in your household exposed to the outdoors.

Update!
Ok. Wednesday and Thursday M&S traded, with government agreement, with every department in our mixed clothing, home and food stores open.
Today - total u-turn

Awaiting full official confirmation but it seems that M&S are being classed as a department store so despite having an area selling essential food, are not being allowed to keep the clothing and home area's open.
To say we, as staff, are gutted is an understatement. Management are I'm sure just as disappointed to be stopped...

header: Susan Macklin is looking for recommendations.

content:
I’m very impressed with Marks and Spencer’s in Lymington after 6mnths in lockdown because of my Husband’s COPD I felt very safe in there the staff where amazing and I felt very safe and now go in once a week and get some lovely special things that we’ve missed for all those months .
When a went in for the first time after those mnths they could see I was nervous and asked if I was ok and I told them it was my first time out and they really looked after me and when I paid for my goodies they...
Thankyou for excepting me in your group

Long saga.
Paid my account June 1st then set up direct debit.
They accepted and said it may take time, so next bill phoned up and was told don’t worry it will go through DD.
Next get a email saying are you in trouble as you haven’t paid. Phoned again man on loudspeaker (it was a hot day) asked him twice and he said no, so gave answer to security questions, my husband was furious.
Found them the payment had gone through.
Totally disgusted with their service. If you question them they blame Covid, not bad service. Rant Over.
Food is good. Clothes sadly not so much.
Thank you for having me
Thank you for accepting me x
Thank you for adding me ☺️

Here’s one very disappointed customer sad to say.
I sent for a pair of leopard print pyjama bottoms and a Feline slogan pyjama top
online together with a short winter per una jacket all in a size 10.
Unfortunately the pyjama top and bottom are miles to big all over in width and length. I’m pretty sure they would fit up to a size 14 or 16 . Why is M&S incapable of getting their sizing right . There is no way that I am a size 8 certainly not with any other brand. Although the length of the jacket...

I met my future wife linda nee martin at marks and Spencer’s week Street Maidstone kent in late60s lindaworkedonthe counters and me in the warehouse sent home on my first day because I wasn’t wearing a tie! Very hard work but some lovely people my ambition to become a manager never achieved but happy memories John Bratley

A while ago I complained that I had issues with getting anyone at M&S to look into my complaint about a bonus points voucher that didn't work. I had phoned and emailed and got nowhere, and as I'd had a good moan (and been informed other people had the same issue) I thought I'd let you know that I went on to the M&S "have your say" page and PM'd them, they told me the best thing was to log in to M&S bank and use the on-line "secure message" facility. I just had a look to see if there was any...
Women’s clothes are BORING and I’m 79! Also the models wearing them are shapeless in the main. Lost my business quite a few years ago!
Evening everyone just thought I'd give a quick message
Have you ever been at the till and they have asked you to do a feedback survey? 🤔

These surveys are a great way for us to get feedback of you it not only helps us improve our service it also gives recognition for staff who have made your shopping experience that bit more personal 😁
It's also a great way to get your favourite products back 🙏
My vegan sauce . Chopped tomatoes and passata from M&S the best chopped tomatoes and garlic .
My turn today 😞 at St Helier Hospital M&S food.
Asked the manager called Paige for a reprint of my receipt politely because the self check out ran out of printer ink and she gave me the worst look ever!

She didn’t respond to my request and walked to the till to reprint, wouldn’t work, she started again and did an exchange to get a receipt, she then put the receipt in the packing area. No eye contact, unfriendly body language and not a word spoken from start to end let alone an apology or thank...

I see a lot of poor service posts on here and I also see a lot of comments saying management are a let down. Please don't think every manager is, I work in the Anniesland branch and I take so much pride and pleasure working there. It honestly does feel like my own store I know a lot of the customers names I even have the privilege to call a lot of them friends. My team just lke myself are not always perfect but we do try our best every time we clock on so please continue to support your local store we do appreciate your custom.
Evening all
Quality worth every penny! I'm forever loyal to M&S, just love it! Crystal 'Ceej' Simon

I work in a food factory at RF brookes Rogerstone 2SFG. We make and hand pack all your ready meals and box meals.... things ranging from potato gratin to rice and chickens... including our expanded box meal selection “Indian box meal” “Chinese box meal” and more......
....... What I’m trying to say...

I received a sweater this morning.
It was on a hanger, and the hanger was broken in 2 places, so there were sharp bits.
Fortunately, the sweater wasn't damaged.
Can I suggest that it may not be a good plan to continue putting hangers into online deliveries? There is so much stuff going through delivery agencies, that there are bound to be coathanger casualties :)

Has anyone else experienced no offers coming through on their sparks card? Never had any problems with the previous one (before they changed the sparks system). Informed customer services on 28/8/20 and was advised by 2 separate advisers to collect a new one from the store which seemed rather odd rather than investigating why the offers weren't filtering through on the existing one. Several conversations later was told I had been misinformed and was really due to a technical issue! By now this...

Once again those of us without smartphones are being discriminated against - this time with paperless returns.Whilst appreciating the need to reduce paper, I think it is most unfair that instore returns are not going to be accepted unless one is in possession of such a phone. The instruction is "you must show your digital order summary on your mobile device". Otherwise a long trek to a post office or booking a courier. Have to order on-line due to reduced stocks instore plus of course no...
Just had a look at the new Autumn collection of womens clothes. there was over 500 items. I looked through whole collection and found 2 items that might be worth a look everything else was awful.
I think it’s quite sad that when the height of the pandemic erupted we (M&S employees) were considered “ Essential” workers. Now 7000 of us face redundancy as “ Expendable” workers!!!
Glad to hear today that my M&S at the Stadium MK will have Cinnamon in the coffee shop from now on. Thanks to the ladies who work there and ensured this happened. Thank you ladies.

Very unhappy customers! Took my Mother to Bexhill Marks and Spencers and it was my Mother's first outting for 7 months due to Covid. We had been to the clothes section and decided to buy some bits in the foodhall. The queues were very busy so approached the manager to ask for help, when I asked for assistance he told me to read his badge to see who he was .... Very rude and sarcastic and this is the Manager.😠. We always go to Marks and Spencers but definitely not this branch!!!!

Just wanted to say I am dismayed at what Marks & Spencer call 'customer services' !
I telephoned 6 times, each time I was told the issue would be dealt with and each time nothing happened in total the calls cost me over £25,so I decided to email 'customer services' that was around a month ago ...no reply not even to say they received my email then I emailed CEO that was around a fortnight ago and no response there either, I really expected better.
Definitely think marks has gone down, nothing in the stores for me too trendy

I bought a pair of M&S jeans in store, just before lockdown. They were the Sophia high waist, straight leg, and they fitted PERFECTLY. I decided to order another pair online in the darker blue, same size, and they were about 3cm longer. Still, I kept them because I love the fit and just had to remember not to wear flat shoes with them.
Well, since then, I've ordered and returned 3 more pairs in various colours. The green ones wouldn't fasten but were the right length, the indigo fastened but...
Hi does anyone know how I can ask a question about their food how can I do it through there website please be kind I have a learning disability
Anybody brought a Giant Percy Pig teddy yet? I love mine :)

We purchased a dinner set yesterday from M&S at Cribs Causeway, when we got home one bowl was a different colour we had to go back to return it round trip forty miles . We got a different set & ordered one one line to be collected in Weston it arrived as promised today sadly when we unwrapped it three dinner plates were broken , when we took it back to Flowerdown store they weren’t helpful as we didn’t take the outside box back eventually they took it & say we have to wait up to three weeks for a refund ! Thanks M&S .
Can I buy the Christmas gins online??? I have been to M&S three times now early morning and they have been sold out each time ??
Yes love M&S brilliant shop I always use

Bought two T-shirt’s and a pair of trousers online, the T-shirt’s are rubbish and the trousers so thin will have to return them . How will people manage if we are limited in the amount of travel we can do like the 5 mile limit.
It’s bad enough that many of your stores don’t stock size 22 T-shirt’s.
M&S tell us to order online......a joke this week
I enjoy M&S meals but for the passed year I think they down sized the meal packets
Is it just me or are there no £5 packs of macaroons in stores atm? They’re my fave 😬😳

My favourite shop of all, I have shopped there for many years, for food and most of my clothes are from marks and Spencer’s. Only disappointing things I used to be able to pick trousers of the rack in regular, now you have to have them taken up. Not sure who is making them now but I have to go elsewhere, it wouldn’t stop me shopping there as not many of our things haven’t got a marks label on. Wish they would start delivering up here.

I’ve shopped at M&S fir a lot of years and always find the staff very helpful snd pleasant I’ve got to know them as I go in regular most of my clothes are there’s and shoes handbags , food shop etc , two shops have closed so I go a bit far away to meadowhall one some of the staff are still there I met years ago they are all lovely and can’t do enough to help you , I love all there food products and clothes etc I wouldn’t do my food shop anywhere else ,thank you M& S for your service 👍👏👏👏
Looking forward to trying this newbie. Their milk and cookies chocolate spread was stupidly good last year.
When is m and s christmas food brochure coming out. Cant be long now x
Does anyone have chicken tagliatelle the ready meal what are your thoughts
Was really disappointed went to buy the giant Percy pig today and sold out
What is everyone’s opinions of the caterpillar ‘Connie’ is this colins girlfriend?
Have loved M&S since I married 55yrs ago love everything about them
Love m and s wish you could come to the Costa Blanca every body wants you here

Sorry I'm deleting this page nothing but moaning people, thankfully in the M&S store where I work we have 99% lovely customers who usually thank us for working through this terrible pandemic, but since lockdown has eased the moaners have become worse than ever!😪
PS: I love my job❤

Reopen the cafe in the Knightswood branch please - old people get tired shopping and it was a place they could sit whilst younger fitter people did the shopping. It was the only place I could put my mother in a wheelchair to shop local to us when she was over 90.
The reason it is so important is that older people need their appetite stimulated by being able to see and smell food.
I’ve just had my first on line groceries delivered. No problems at all. Everything was in stock. I even had a phone call from the driver to ask if it was ok to drop them In earlier than booked.

I’m guessing as Christmas approaches most clothes will be black or red and warm jumpers will have Christmas symbols or sparkle on them, none of which I ever wear. I’m still looking years on for warm tops that have shape, V necks and heaven forbid sleeves that go to the wrists. Also your tee shirts are dull and see through and again never have flattering necklines ie boat, V and square. I’m in my sixties and slim and never find anything to buy.

Why do I work my guts out for Marks and Spencer Anniesland. I love my job, I love my team and I honestly believe we give great service. Yes we get things wrong but we honestly do try our best, I often do extra hours without pay as I do it for my team. So when in store please remember we are trying our best in unprecedented times
Thank you for allowing me onto your site.

This has probably already been said. I think M&S are loosing the plot. There are many mature ladies (including myself) who want to buy stylish clothes, but are unable to find much in their stores, they need to employ new designers. Our store closed 18 months ago, so now we have to drive 20 miles to visit. Having said that, I think their food is great, especially chicken Kiev’s which we have as a special treat.
I was a member on the site and posted a comment today. Had some nasty comments but my reply couldn't be posted.
Says the post had been removed by its owner. Me. Not so.
Now I look for the group again and find I am not a member so I have just rejoined.
What's going on?
Really pleased Boris has said shop staff should wear masks! About time too!
Hello
I'm so pleased that on the waist/high waist trousers are in fashion this year. Long may it last :)
Found this bag things sure have changed !!! But well done Croydon Marks for remaining open and the staff have always been cheerful and helpful .

Did anybody see an email to say that your reward vouchers would only be extended by a month. I thought it would be the March deadline same as other vouchers! I phoned bank and they explained if the shop refused? to go back. Anyway I managed to use them in the newwport store £30! Check your dates
Hate having to hand over phone to get sparks card scanned. Want to go back to a card as much easier and safer. Can I do this?

Does anyone else have a passion for M&S Caponata? I have it nearly every morning with my fried egg and toast. It tastes delicious, with wholesome ingredients, and I think I am addicted. My other favourite accompaniment was Bombette, a hot scotch bonnet dip, but M&S stopped selling it. I am now afraid they will discontinue my Caponata. That is why I hope people keep buying it to keep the jars on the shelves.

When l was in the Uk 2013- 2015 l used to buy from M&S for clothes like suits, shirts, ties. Wallet for leather. I do prefer M&S so it helped me for buying gifts as well. I visited M&S in London, Manchester, and leicester. But l would certify that staff so lovely in Brighton in particular and leicester where l lived. Once l backed home Tripoli l still prefer M&S to others also staff in Tripoli are helpful and delicate! But goods less than What in the Uk. Plz accept my regards all. Thanks

I clicked Yes to the Sparks card offers as I do each week & this week it was a pleasant surprise after I got my free packet of Percy Pig sweets, gave to neighbours child. Then I queried another offer & I got a rather lovely perfumed candle. THANK YOU M&S
Has anybody else struggled with internet access to their M&S credit card on a PC since M&S upgraided their security? I have now asked for the bill to be posted.

Mini Collectables 2 have finished for this year, but because of Covid Restrictions we have only just received ours from a family member as shopping has been quite a challenge this year. Very fortunate to have collected 18 of the 25 available. Is there anywhere that we can possibly get anymore as I believe that Swop In Store is not being allowed this year.

Men's cotton twill shirts. My husband has been buying these for the last 65 years! Local store/stores do not have them and he cannot order them via the web. The web states that they are not available. In phoning customer services he asked if they were not available temporarily or forever. The reply was that they will be no longer be available forever! M & S why do you stop supplying one of your basic, popular items? Many of our friends and family wear these shirts and they are all incredulous...
Thanks for the add.
My 1 yr old granddaughter just loves Percy she had to have the big one
Have M&S discontinued the free drinks vouchers permanently
Thanks M&S For delivering our new table not just on time but 45 minutes early. Brilliant, but what about the packaging other than the cardboard. Where is it recycled or is it not recyclable?
Oh my goodness, have just seen a picture of the £25 cuddly percy pig - it appears to be huge 😁 better get in there quick if you want one, think it's tomorrow they go on sale!!
Oh dear there are a lot of unhappy shoppers and the staff are having to put up with a lot of criticism. Just be glad that shops are open. It seems no one can get it right.
Go to my m/S in maldon love the staff always friendly and helpfully would love home shop in maldon

I visited M&S on Saturday in Hartlepool , and got a lovely surprise too , to be told I had got the " Shopping on us " today .
Had my photo taken too , but up until now have not been able to find it .
CONGRATULATIONS M&S for issuing great treats .

I went to M & S last week for new socks and was delighted to see some labelled ‘ non marking’ so duly bought some.
M & S, they do still mark !!!
Big thank you to the wonderful staff at Biggleswade M&S. They make shopping a lovely experience instead of the usual nightmare
Thank you...had first m&s delivery today very impressed...driver very helpful explained bag system. I miss shopping at my local m&s so this is next best thing xxx
Are the stores accepting returns of clothing at the moment? Thank you.
Does anyone know an email address for M&S where you can register a complaint? I have looked at the contact us page on the website but cannot find an email address.

M and S sandwiches were always a nice treat.
Good quality ingredients and well prepared.

However clearly this is no longer the case.
Very disappointed with the 4 packs we purchased today. All had tomorrow’s date but we’re all past their best. Soggy bread, limp lettuce and no word to describe what was meant to be chicken in the chicken and avocado sandwich.
All disappointed spoiled our afternoon tea out.
Won’t buy again.
Had breakfast in M&S (Newcastle) this morning, delicious. The staff there are lovely. Rosie was so happy, chatting to her customers & putting a smile on everyone’s face. Thank you 😊

Can I just say a massive thank you to all the people who have put up nice comments about there local store. Please remember a lot of these stores are going through consolidation for job losses. I am sure all these comments are helping pick up there spirits. 👍
Did you know that in Camberley store you can now pick up your order Via Drive Up... That’s right.. you don’t even have to get out of the car..
Join our store page for regular, exciting updates!
#mandslocal

It's lovely reading all the positive comments about staff and stores posted here. If you haven't already done so please can you also fill in the little service survey at the link below. Any comments there are read by the relevant store manager, so they can recognise and thank the staff mentioned. ...
Love shopping at Marks and Spencers Talbot green store xx

My first time out today, only got as far as m&s at hempstead valley, staff as always very helpful and understanding, I mentioned it was my first trip out to both members of staff who served me. My first bit of shopping came to £36 but as I was allowed to used my 2 £10 premium vouchers for clothing and home so it cost me £16, I was beginning to feel like I'd done enough but gave myself a talking to and ventured into the food dept. my food shopping there came to £25.50 I had 2 £12 premium food...

Not impressed bought a men's coat when I got home had been charged for a coffee will have to see someone one next visit to reclaim 2_50 as we are pensioners not going to town except when necessary increadable men's department sell coffee
Contact us on MESSENGER to find out how you can join our M&S Admins group; so that with your help we can make our group MORE wonderful!
We have raised a stunning £79,340 at the Camberley store for the Amazing NHS charities together!

Thanks for accepting me. We use M & S quite a lot for food, so when it became possible to get it delivered online, thought it was a very good idea. The big problem is, that the food items we get regularly, are not actually listed. I knw it is early days, but will everything available in the stores be available online as well?
Hi does the sale go from 70% off to further reductions then 80% off or is it straight to clearance after 70%.Many thanks!
Rescued this from my boyfriend's mum as she was going to use a a rubbish bag. I know im sad
Wheres the post about the gin glasses not being delivered gone ?
I have tried to buy pyjama bottoms can’t find any in a size twelve short . I’m very disappointed that you seem to have no stock on things that have just gone on sale .

I have been a customer...shop and online for many years....I ordered some rainbow gin glasses for a present paid via paypal ...never received...complained to paypal which they sent several enquiries to Mark's &Spencer no reply....so no more shopping online in this store again !!!!!!

I regularly send parcels of M&S clothing to my family in New Zealand which they love . My nieces 12 yr old daughter , I have to purchase size 15/16 which fit her really well but the metro centre store in Gateshead and the Eldon centre store In Newcastle never stock these sizes . I have to order on...

Please can M&S in Scotland confirm if it is true they have bowed to pressure from nationalists to remove the Union Flag on produce and replace it with the Saltire? If this is true it is utterly disgraceful that they have capitulated on this. When I last looked Scotland was still part of the United Kingdom.

Marks and Spencer Newport, Isle of Wight ,
Well stocked clothing and food sections.
Friendly and helpful staff. Spacious and clean. Only thing unhappy is my bank account!!
Sadly I’m unable to get a 46F bra 😢from marks and Spencer 😢
Would love to order M & S food from Ocado. Tried today... no delivery in my area. I feel discriminated against. 😡
Please when will you have boys 13/14 plus size trousers in grey or charcoal back in stock

My husband brought a bottle of wine In our local shop and when he removed cork the bottle neck broke cutting his hand - (he’s an experienced bottle opener and never happened before) we reported it and had to get the bottle collected to send to M & S glass technology people - heard nothing since - wine was undrinkable as worried about glass - no apology no refund! Lovely x

This last while has been so so hard for everyone but we are all getting on with our life's the best we can , for many they have lost family members or family due to this horrible disease I feel so sorry for them. For others they might have lost there jobs which is mentally and financially hard. People might not show on there face all the time the stress they are going through but it is there and life is very very challenging right now. Marks and spencer have had to make a hard decision regarding...
Anyone know what happened to the post about the lasagne post about the cockroach in it? Who ever posted it please inbox me. Thank you.￼￼
Oh dear just been to the new sparkling M and S in Maidstone - nothing ready in the cafe and nothing ready in the bakery - lost custom oh dear

Had the dine in for £12 offer today. The Lasagne Al Forno is tremendous. The staff in the Silverlink working so hard to keep the shelves stocked still had time to be lovely and polite. Only the first time I've been in a shop since lockdown. Xx

I was delighted with my fresh fruit and veg box - but horrified at the amount of single use plastic contained within the cardboard box! Come on M&S - be the forerunners in the race to be rid of plastics in food packaging. This box, for example, could have been filled with shredded card or paper to...

5/9/1983 I was proud to walk into this building as a young 16 year old fresh out of school to start my career at Marks and Spencer and I am proud to say 37 years later I still walk in and out of this building with 37 years worth of loyalty, friendship and many many memories, some sad but the...
We are getting ready to celebrate Colin’s 30th Birthday and to help celebrate we have launched Brand new Mini Colin Faces (£2) available at your M&S in Camberley! 🐛
Had a fantastic surprise when we were shopping at M&S Teesside Park on Thursday. When we swiped our Sparks card we got our shopping for FREE. Thank you M&S.

shopping last week and was excited to see the "money of if you spend over" vouchers were back.....then looked at it and it was £7 of if you spend £70!!....really....now you've basically cut out most of the older generation that maybe live alone...and dont need that much shopping in one go...or cant carry that much...when it was £5 of shopping over £35 I could add extra tea bags coffee and washing liquid to go over.....there are many people who cant do the £70 target in one go...have a rethink M&S please

Marks and Spencer. Despite numerous emails, waiting on the telephone for the call to be answered, told I would be transferred to a manager, calls back from M&S where a message was left and when you call back it says that we (M&S) called you today and you are referred to the web site, not informed of what the problem is exactly, delivery on 13 th August although bed was not on the vehicle, another delivery arranged for 21st August but only one correct half of the base on board (one half only)...
THE ORIGINAL AND BEST caterpillar cake! 🐛

COLIN THE CATERPILLAR TURNS 30!
Can you believe that Colin the Caterpillar is about to celebrate his 30th birthday?! M&S first launched Colin in 1990 and he became an immediate bestseller – going down in chocolate cake history!
There’s been Colin copy...
https://www.facebook.com/groups/194657318653574/permalink/229406718511967/
does anyone know if you get Sparkes points with M&S food shopping on Ocado

Admins can:
- remove posts / members breaking rules
- write rules
- work on a project together
- help develop the group to be different
- contribute in a range of other ways...
- use as much or as little time as they like
- manage surveys
- use their creative skills
- suggest a joint project ...
Always shop MS,Longwater Norwich have always been satisfied with shopping there staff are always polite excellent service
The brand new M&S store at Ulverston, Cumbria is beautiful!!
A genuinely lovely shopping experience!
Spotless! Well stocked shelves! Bargains! And super helpful staff who could do enough improve your shopping experience 💫
Awaiting my first delivery of M&S food from Ocado. So happy that I can now get my food shopping from my favourite store online. We in Deal miss our local store so much xx
M& S store at Kingston park has been a great food shopping experience for me.
Watch out Percy is about
We regularly post this group’s LINK to the M&S social media pages, advising them to look at all the feedback!
Also we have M&S employees in this group, which we welcome in the same way as all our members. Everyone is welcome & valued!
It is a feedback group and not managed by M&S.

The M&S social media don’t provide, in our opinion, a true way for ALL comments (except those comments which occasionally may not be genuine, are abusive or / and break the rules) to be voiced and presented to M&S.

Recently visited Marks in Chester our main store for many years was very disappointed at the state of the store I do realise it was during a very difficult time just after lockdown had ceased the stock levels and display looked very much like they were closing down, in contrast a few doors away Primark had just reopened and the rails where full of good fresh stock fully staffed and ready to go with social distancing and signs everywhere, the staff had clearly been in training for some time and...

Seen the current furniture offer from M&S and concerned about its inequality. We’ve just ordered a new dining table but because it didn’t cost £499 we didn’t get 10% discount. Thinking about the offer, if the table had cost £500 there would have been a £50 discount and you would pay £450. However had the table cost £495 you would have to pay £495. That isn’t equitable in my view and not customer friendly!

Hello everyone I’m new to this group & also an employee of M&S
It’s lovely to hear all the positive comments they are very much appreciated 😀 & constructive comments because yes we don’t get it right all the time but am really proud to say I work for M&S & am happy to help if I can....speaking from a foot soldier & hopefully my extra colleagues will agree xxx life long Percy lover
Please note - customersto and STAFF - none of whom seem to be wearing them in Hedge End food hall.

Good evening, I am one of the managers in Anniesland store Glasgow. I would personally like to thank everyone in this group for some of the lovely comments I have seen, the last couple of months have been really hard for staff just like so many others. We try our best every day, personally for me I had my son during lockdown so I took two weeks off and went back to work as I believed it was the right thing to do as we are a team in store. The comments on here have made me ☺ 👍

I have tried several times this morning to get through to M & S Mastercard without success, Each time it goes overseas and they have no idea what I am talking about. (I cannot get a security code to access online account) BUT they REFUSE to transfer me to Chester, saying they have no number! Also refuse to let me speak to either a supervisor or manager. I'm sorry for the staff at M & S who will lose their jobs but as a Company they ask for it. They are not what they were. How are we supposed to contact Chester??
Ocado deliveries start next week will I still get my staff discount applied when ordering ?

Hello from Australia, we have been here 20 years, from the UK. My wife and i were regular M&S Customers and i enjoyed this as i was an ‘off the shelf’ purchaser, could grab shirts and trousers off the rack and they fitted. We have even enjoyed M&S in Hong Kong.
Recently my wife purchased bra’s on line, delivered in wizzo time of 4 days from the UK, but the Bra’s did not fit. (She must have changed shape with age) Plus one item missing,(Included in this consignment were 4 items not ordered) So...

Advice please,
My mum is 85, she’s been looking forward to getting her free bag, we don’t get out much as she has been isolated since March. Our local Kingston park branch never have them in when we get there. She doesn’t feel safe going into Newcastle, and now I’m back at work I can’t go with her 😔
Yeeppee BRA FITTING IS BACK ! In my local store on the Isle of Man missed it so much coz I’ve put weight in through lockdown.

Why is the stock levels so low. I went to Westfield Stratford store to buy a nightdress,slippers but they only had a couple to choose from. As a older women I like cotton nightdresses from marks but was disappointed with the choice. Not everybody can shop on line
Hi, when M&S start doing home’s delivery September 1st through Ocado. If I pay with my M&S card will it be linked to my sparks card, also will the points for reward vouchers work the same.
Thank you marks & spencer for letting me join your group 🎂🍰🍰

Has this happened to anyone else, my friend has just been to M&S at Maybird Shopping Cenre in Stratford upon Avon to return an item, only to be told that they are only accepting returns for items purchased in store because of goverment guideline due to covid 19, do they think that other stores are infected, this is so studid

A small request, as a current M&S employee, please could I ask customers to be mindful of the situation we find ourselves at the moment, having worked through/being furloughed throughout lockdown, we are now all in the precarious position of awaiting the outcome of a consultation process before forced redundancy may take place.
Please consider the nature/seriousness of your complaint and also consider which steps you could take to resolve the matter, without the need to make the issue public.
Happy 30th Birthday to Colin our famous Caterpillar Cake! Grab your now along with some new tasty treats at your M&S Camberley!! 🐛

Just been invited to enter a completion to win £500 M&S voucher. Lovely but of course there is a catch. I must agree to PAY FOR SMS MESSAGES that I get included in my phone package.
If this is a genuine M&S promotion then I am disappointed that they would do this and if it is some kind of CON then hope they will do something about it.

M&S London Colney. I had a credit note for £25 which ran out on the 4th August. I went to the store and asked if this could still be used. I only wear M and S jeans and I have noticed that every single one of my cotton tops develops tiny holes in exactly the same place. Researching this I have learnt that it's the nickel buttons used in M and S jeans that react with my tops. This is costing me a small fortune and unless the buttons are changed I am going to have to stop buying M and S jeans. Please will any others who have the same problem alert M and S to the fact.
